title: description
Administrative Time Period: A custom defined time period for administrative purposes.

title: properties.metadata.properties.createdBy.description
Administrative Time Period: The name of the originator (user or system) of the data. This is informational only
column3: do not use in business logic!

title: properties.metadata.properties.createdOn.description
Administrative Time Period: The date and time when the entity instance was created

title: properties.metadata.properties.modifiedBy.description
Administrative Time Period: The name of the modifier (user or system) of the data. This is informational only
column3: do not use in business logic!

title: properties.metadata.properties.modifiedOn.description
Administrative Time Period: The date and time when the entity instance was last modified

title: properties.id.description
Administrative Time Period: A global identifier of an administrative time period.

title: properties.code.description
Administrative Time Period: A code that identifies an administrative time period.

title: properties.title.description
Administrative Time Period: The full name of an administrative time period (e.g. '2014-2015 Reporting Year').

title: properties.description.description
Administrative Time Period: A description of an administrative time period.

title: properties.startOn.description
Administrative Time Period: The date when an administrative period begins

title: properties.endOn.description
Administrative Time Period: The date when an administrative period ends

title: properties.type.description
Administrative Time Period: A categoration of an administrative period.
